item.title: Requests html vs BeautifulSoup
item.description:
Requests html

Requests Downloads files and web pages from the Internet.

The requests library is the main factor standard for making HTTP requests in Python. It abstracts the complexities of making requests behind a beautiful, simple API so that you can focus on interacting with services and consuming data in â€¦

item.title: pipenv
item.description:
pipenv automatically creates and manages virtual environments for your projects as you go. use python versions as required, which is life changing.

On MacOS, installation is as easy as:

!pip install pipenv
